title: Bug 134444Locale setting lost when change current page with internal bookmark
description: Description:Locale setting lost when change current page with internal bookmarkSteps to reproduce:1. Insert two labels2. Add bookmark in the first label3. In the second label,set internal bookmark link to the first label, set pagebreakbefore to always.4. In preference, set Locale to a different locale.5. Preview in Web Viewer, go to the second page and click the link.Expected result:Locale setting in webaddress keeps unchanged.Actual result:After click the link, Locale setting lost in webaddress.
